The Procedure States RNP 1… Can I Fly It?
It is important to understand why some Flight Management Systems cannot fly RNP 1 procedures... Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/may/inside-the-fms]]>
Performance <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/may/performance]]> What is Optimum Altitude, Anyway?
The Optimum altitude was designed to tailor performance predictions and provides different calculations based on the cruise speed mode selected during Performance Initialization... Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/may/performance]]> PIREP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/may/pirep]]> What to Expect When You’re Expecting to Fly a Procedure
Curious why certain details of a charted procedure differ from those in the electronic navigation database (NDB)? Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/may/pirep]]>
The Required Navigation Performance (RNP) Corner <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/may/the-rnp-corner]]> Understanding Advanced RNP
